- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)

## Useful Info

**Crystal guardians** are moderately durable [golems](/List_of_golems "List of golems") capable of launching powerful bolts of crystal at anything they encounter. These bolts are unusual in that they can make the target [fragile](/Fragile "Fragile"). Crystal guardians can be found in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") (usually with a [peacekeeper](/Peacekeeper "Peacekeeper")), the [Desolation of Salt](/Desolation_of_Salt "Desolation of Salt"), and some [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                       |                                                      |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Crystallizing Shot](/Crystallizing_Shot "Crystallizing Shot") (2d24) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Their bolts can make you [fragile](/Fragile "Fragile"), so try not to let them hit you when other monsters are around.
- They have infinite [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") and resistances to most elements. [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") will obliterate them (and anything nearby). Other sorts of [Earth Magic](/Earth_Magic "Earth Magic") and pure [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") are also effective.

## History

- Prior to [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), crystal guardians had [Crystal Bolt](/Crystal_Bolt "Crystal Bolt") instead of [Crystallizing Shot](/Crystallizing_Shot "Crystallizing Shot").
- Crystal guardians were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), replacing [crystal golems](/Crystal_golem "Crystal golem").

An intricate animated statue made of heavily ensorcelled crystal that is immune to most forms of magic. The spells which created it are so powerful that even flesh may start to crystalize around any fragments that become embedded in it - leaving its foes brittle and vulnerable.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells

  • 4 History

Useful Info

Crystal guardians are moderately durable golems capable of launching powerful bolts of crystal at anything they encounter. These bolts are unusual in that they can make the target fragile. Crystal guardians can be found in the Vaults (usually with a peacekeeper), the Desolation of Salt, and some vaults.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Crystallizing Shot (2d24) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Their bolts can make you fragile, so try not to let them hit you when other monsters are around.
  • They have infinite willpower and resistances to most elements. Lee's Rapid Deconstruction will obliterate them (and anything nearby). Other sorts of Earth Magic and pure Conjurations are also effective.

History

  • Prior to 0.32, crystal guardians had Crystal Bolt instead of Crystallizing Shot.
  • Crystal guardians were added in 0.14, replacing crystal golems.
